item.title: Running in the summer sea, Samcheok & Donghae - Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
Changho Port Canoe Experience

Running in the summer sea, Samcheok & Donghae

Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea

<Total travel distance>
Samcheok Jangho Port (Jangho Fishing Village Experience Village) → 3 minutes by car 2 km → Samcheok Ocean Rail Bike (Yonghwa Station) → 30 minutes by car 28 km → Samcheok Sol Beach Hotel & Resort (Water Park Aqua World) → 10 minutes by car 6 km → Chuam Candlestick Rock ( Chuam Beach) → 12 minutes by car 8.5km → Cheongok Natural Cave → 18 minutes by car 12km → Mureung Valley
Samcheok, Gangwon-do, the hidden gem of the East Sea. From the coastal view of Jangho Port, climb a transparent canoe and swim the sea with its bottom exposed. The beach, where you can enjoy the ocean rail bike running through the picturesque East Sea seascape and plunge at any time, is a playground for all kids who love water. Here's a romantic overnight stay at a resort that seems to come to Santorini, Greece. The journey continues to the east coast of Jicheok. If you soak your feet in the cold valley waters of the Mureung Valley through the Chuam Candlestick Rock, one of the famous sunrise spots in the East Sea, and the Chungok Cave in the middle of downtown, with a history of 500 million years, I would like to say, 'This is happiness! The trip to Donghae and Samcheok in Gangwon-do is perfect for making blue memories with a child on a summer day.
"The hips are floating in the sea!", A transparent canoe experience
Samcheok Jangho Village, called Naples in Korea, is famous for its 'transparent canoe experience' because the coastline is superb. As a village famous for fishing villages, family-level outings line up for the experience from the entrance of the village in Seongsugi-myeon in summer.
Canoe Boarding Waiting Place
In Jangho Fishing Village, transparent canoes are definitely popular. You can freely swim in the buoy until the breakwater with the dune bridge (cloud bridge) in between. The place is shallow, the waves are calm, and the terrain itself is a natural windshield, making it suitable for canoeing. All infants and toddlers of all ages can ride with the guardian. However, due to the nature of the canoe, you must ride while balancing both sides.
Life jackets prepared by size
The child wears a life jacket and sits on a canoe with a transparent bottom, and says, "Mom, the sea is floating on my ass!" Adults can feel the thrill as they look into the ocean.
2-seater transparent canoe experience
Paddles should be paddled so that the canoe does not tilt to one side. If you are going through a canoeing experience, it is good to get wet and prepare extra clothes.
Canoe experience where balancing is important
Canoes are available on weekends from May and operate daily from July to September without holidays. However, because it is affected by the weather, it is essential to inquire by phone on the day of the experience or the day before.
Overpass and Dundaeam
The cool East Sea view from Dundaeam, close to the canoeing experience, is also a gem.
View from the top of Dundaeam
There are some steep trails that require attention from guardians.
Jangho Village Bridge
Running the sea, Samcheok offshore rail bike
Samcheok Offshore Rail Bike (Yonghwa Station), located 3 minutes away by car from Jangho Village, is Samcheok's representative tourist destination selected as a Korean tourism star in 2014. Rail Bike runs 5.4 km between Yonghwa Station and Gungchon Station by double track, and you will be impressed by the surrounding scenery of the railroad that runs along the coastline of the East Sea all the way through the rail bike.
Photo zone around offshore rail bike
When you get on a rail bike, you have to think hard about the gap with the leading bike, and step hard. If a pregnant woman or an infant is on board, the rearmost bike may be assigned in consideration of the risk of collision, so please ask the safety personnel in advance. When riding with a child, care must be taken to prevent the chain from getting caught in the hands and feet between the rotating parts, wheels, and rails.
Mysterious tunnel
The uphill section is electric, so you can enjoy the surrounding scenery without much difficulty. Gomsol and gigantic rocks in the East Sea delight the eyes. In the section, there are three tunnels with the theme of 'festival', 'mystery', and 'heroic hero Hwang Young-jo'.
Laser show section
As you walk through the tunnel of illusion created by Luminarie and the laser show, you feel like you are traveling through a mysterious submarine tunnel, because there is a section of 'Hwang Young-jo, the hero of Montjuic' because Samchok Chogok Port is the hometown of Marathoner Hwang Young-jo.
Photo of Samcheok representative tourist spot in the tunnel
Stop at Chogok Rest Area, the middle stop, for about 10 minutes. They sell simple food at rest areas. If you run out of energy while stepping on the lungs, you can easily replenish it here.
Chogok Rest Area
Departure may be from Yonghwa Station or Gungchon Station, depending on the travel route. Free shuttle buses run from each station, so you can easily go back to your starting point.
Chogok Rest Area
The time required for offshore rail bikes is about one hour, and on the fourth Wednesday of each month, the rail bike is not operated on the day of safety inspection. It runs five times a day at two-hour intervals from 9:00 a.m., which is popular, so reservation is required. It runs from 7pm on weekends and holidays from April to October.
Gungchon Station Shuttle Bus
Romantic day at Sol Beach Resort, Santorini, Samcheok
Samcheok Sol Beach Resort & Hotel, meaning the beach of the sun, is recommended for children. It is a perfect place to spend all day with children, as there are beaches dedicated to Sol Beach, promenades in the resort, Santorini Plaza, restaurants, various amenities, and water parks. As it is, in the peak season, there is some inconvenience in that it is difficult to make a reservation. If you have a vacation plan in Samcheok, you should hurry up.
Sol Beach Resort
When you enter the resort, the harmony of white exterior walls and blue roofs catches your eye. Just visit the Greek Cycladic architecture and feel like you have left for a distant country.
Santorini square night view
Even if you don't have to stay, you can freely use the Santorini Square or other facilities, so it's worth taking a look around. Especially at night, beautiful lighting is added to give an exotic scenery.
Santorini square night view
If you're with an infant or toddler, try Samcheok Aqua World, a 'four season water park'.
Aquaworld outdoor swimming pool
Family showers and play facilities are well-equipped for families of young children.
Aquaworld outdoor swimming pool
In addition, there are all convenience facilities such as coin laundry, so you can purchase most items even if you missed the necessary travel preparations for your child.
[Left / Right] Nursing room in resort / Convenience store in resort
Chuam Candlestick Rock with Chuam Beach
The Chuam Beach in Donghae City, viewed from Sol Beach Resort, is a 150 m long white sandy beach with shallow water depth, making it a good family resort. Above all, this place has a candlestick rock that serves as the background for the first national video of the national anthem that begins with 'Donghaemul and Baekdusanyi' at the start of television broadcasting.
Candlestick rock trails
It is also famous as the first sunrise spot in Korea. The coastal cliffs around the candlestick rock and the large and small rocky islands combine with the sea to create a spectacular view.
Chuam Candlestick Rock
It is also a good idea to leave a memorable family photo with your child in the background of the candlestick rock.
Candlestick rock trails

Ducks and geese are common sights around Chuam Beach. You can follow people or go close and take pictures. Occasionally, children are ringing in a noisy bucket, but ducks and geese are also a wonder in their eyes.

Goose and Duck in front of Chuam Beach Shop
The mysterious underground world hidden in the city center
Cheongok Natural Cave is a natural cave opened to the public in 1996 after being discovered for the first time during the construction of an apartment in 1991.
Required helmets before entry
It is the only city in the city with good accessibility, and you can observe stone pillars and stalagmites created 500 million years ago. The height of the cave is low, so wearing a helmet is essential before entering.
Cheongok Cave Entrance
The total length of the cave was 1.5km, and a viewing path was created up to 800m. If you go down the ferris wheel, you can meet the mysterious cave world. You can see the stone pillars created by the meeting of stalagmites and stalactites, ornamental stalactites, and ceiling dragons. In addition, it is fun to look up the names of chandeliers, such as Jongyu-seok, Lee Chung-mu's statue, Piano statue, Bat-jong-yu-seok, and black hole.
Inside the cave
It is advisable to hold the child's hand as the interior lighting of the cave is dark, so be careful not to lose your foot when watching. There may be some water on the bottom of the cave, so it may get wet.
Samsil Shindang
The Chungok Cave is also famous for its golden bat habitat. The golden bat is a natural monument with a red body color and a golden color. It is a rare wild animal designated by the Ministry of Environment as No. 1 because of its small population worldwide. Unfortunately, the golden bat is nocturnal, so the chances of seeing the golden bat during viewing are extremely low.
Inside the cave, maintaining an average of 10 °
In particular, the inside of the cave is cool enough to feel cool even in hot summer, making it a perfect summer resort. It is smaller than Samcheok's well-known Hwanseon Cave and Daegeum Cave.
Stalactites from the ceiling
Mureung Valley
Let's go to the Mureung Rock at the beginning of the Mureung Valley in the East Sea, one of the best summer resorts in the East Sea. After walking through the forest road for about 5 minutes after the ticket is purchased at the Mureung Valley Myeongsungji Management Office, the 1,500-pyeong Mureung Rock appears. It is wide enough to seat 2,000 people at a time. The shape of the rock formations reminds me of Mureungdowon. Located between Dootasan and Cheongoksan, the Mureung Valley starts at the Hoamso downstream and reaches the Yongchu Falls about 4km upstream.
Mausoleum rock
It has been known as Korea's representative tourist destination, including National Tourist Site 1, Myeongseung 37, and 100 beautiful rivers in Korea. In the Mureung Valley, there are large and small stone carvings engraved by famous writers and spectators.
Mureung Valley Mureung Rock
The valley boasts beautiful scenery from Mureung Rock, past Samhwasa Temple, Haksodae University, Okryu-dong, and Seonnyeotang, to Ssangpok Falls and Yongchu Falls. If you are traveling with infants and young children, the course to Samhwasa is suitable.
Mureung Valley Forest Road
When you soak your feet in a valley with a child, the caregiver needs extra attention, no matter how shallow it is. This is because there is a lot of water moss everywhere and it is easy to slip.
The way down the valley after playing in the water. You may also encounter squirrels eating jujube or small fruit that hikers have given you. You can feel that this place is a clean nature by seeing that children do not avoid it even when approaching. If you have time, you can stop by Samhwasa.
Squirrel in Wuling Valley
If you go out by playing in the water at Mureung Rock, I recommend Jang Kalguksu, which fills your hunger and warmly protects your speed.
Samcheok Jang Kalguksu
Jangkalguksu is said to be a local food in Gangwon-do that is seasoned with red pepper paste and miso. Unlike the kalguksu that we have seen in general, the broth is red, but it is not overly irritating, and it is suitable for casual enjoyment due to its kalkalham and savory taste.
Samcheok Jang Kalguksu
Travel information

Recommended travel course (same day course)

Samcheok Jangho Beach → Jangho Fishing Village Ocean Experience → Offshore Rail Bike (Yonghwa Station) → Get off at Gungchon Station (Go to Yonghwa Station by shuttle bus) → Freshwater Fish Exhibition Hall → Isabu Lion Park → Chuam Candlestick Rock (Chuam Beach in Donghae)


Recommended travel course (2 nights 3 days course)

first day : Waterway Buheonhwa Park → Samcheok Jangho Beach → Jangho Fishing Village Ocean Experience → Lunch → Offshore Rail Bike (Yonghwa Station) → Get off at Gungchon Station (Go to Yonghwa Station by shuttle bus) → Mengbang Beach Tourist Site
Second day : Freshwater Fish Exhibition Hall → Samcheok Rose Park → Lunch → Cave Mystery Hall → Drive to New Millennium Coast Road → Isabu Lion Park → Chuhae Beach in the East Sea (Chuam Candlestick Rock) → 5 Days of North Pyeongpyeong Folklore in the East Sea (3, 8 days)
third day : Cheongok Natural Cave → Mukho Lighthouse (Chungreong Bridge, Nongoldamgil) → Mureung Valley Myeongseongji (Mureungbanseok, Samhwasa, Ssangpokpo)

item.title: Train theme park to enjoy various train rides, Samcheok High One Chuo Park - Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
High One Chuchu Park Chuchu Station

Train theme park to enjoy various train rides, Samcheok High One Chuo Park

Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea

The train theme park, Samcheok High, where you can ride a variety of trains, including the Swiss mountain train incline train, the nation's fastest rail coaster, a mini train that takes a miniature train that scales down the world's most famous trains, and a switchback to increase the altitude by moving forward and backward. It is a two-day, one-night trip to Conechu Park.

Swiss Mountain Train Encline Train and Rail Coaster
In 1939, the railroad was built to overcome the altitude difference between Sampok-si's Simpo-ri and Taebaek-si's Tongli and operate the train. It was a way to raise the train with wire rope. A wire rope was installed on the sloping railroad at 15.6 degrees and the train was raised. People had to walk on foot to reduce the weight of the train. When people came and went frequently, there was also a bearer who took the elderly on the road and climbed the road.
Incline Train
The Gangsak railway was demolished in 1963. Recently, this section was restored, and the mountain train of Jungfrau, Switzerland, began operating. From Chuchu Station Incline Train Station to Sky Station, the average speed is about 5km per hour, and it takes about 20 minutes. (Currently the incline train is suspended. Normal operation will be announced on the website later.)
View from the rail coaster boarding area
Sky Station is located at 720 meters above sea level. You can capture the magnificent greatness of Baekdu-daegan at a glance when you stand at the observation deck.
Rail Coaster
After enjoying the view from the observation deck, ride the rail coaster. The rail coaster is a rail bike that descends a hill at a maximum speed of 25 km / h.
Rail Coaster
There are 12 tunnels in this section, and you can see the light and sculptures created with different themes for each tunnel. Among them, the image of the tunnel composed of large watch weights and clock sound remains strong. In the tunnel, it seems to move to the time of the tunnel, not the time of the world, to lead the traveler to a new imaginary world. There are tunnels that increase tension with the sound of lightning and light, or where trees are shaped with optical fibers, etc., you can feel the atmosphere of a fantasy forest. You will enjoy the 7.7km section to the arrival point for about 25 minutes.
The rail coaster passes through 12 tunnels
Children's favorite mini train
Once you have enjoyed the view from Sky Station on the Incline Train and then came down to Chuchu Park on the rail coaster, it's time to enjoy the mini trains that kids love.
Mini train steam train
The mini train is a miniature train made by shrinking famous trains from the UK, Japan, and Russia to 1/8 of the actual size. A small train rides around the 700m section of Chuchu Park, which children love, especially with two steam trains and two electric trains, but currently only electric trains. The time required is about 7-10 minutes.
Steam train on the left, electric train on the right
Miniature sculptures are installed throughout the mini-train section. I feel like I'm in a small country by looking at the small train as well as the mini train.
Mini train next to the ecological pond
A variety of character photo zones are popular, where you can stick out your face and take pictures. If you are with children, you can spend a long time on the mini train.
Mini train is running around the course
Switchback train running to the crossroads

In accordance with the name of the train theme park, there is also a switchback train in Chuchu Park. A switchback is a railroad train that is shaped like a strip to operate a train on a sloping section of a mountainous area. Repeat the forward and reverse steps to increase altitude.

Switchback train
In Korea, there was a switchback railroad between Heungjeon Station and Doohan Station in Gangwon-do. In 2012, a tunnel to replace the switchback section was opened, and no trains were allowed in this section. Chuchu Park operates a switchback train in that section. The switchback train is composed of a presidential carriage, a stove carriage, and so on, providing a different atmosphere for each carriage. The round trip from Chuchu Station to Nahanjeong Station takes about 80 minutes.
Switchback railway line
Take the switchback train to Nahanjeong Station and stop for 20 minutes. At this time, tourists can browse the gallery at Nahanjeong Station, enjoy the scenery of the old town around history, or use a pump-type trolley or a pedal-type trolley.
The switchback train is passing Nahanjeong Station
Theme accommodation
There are four types of accommodation in Chuchu Park. First, 15 villas in the form of private villas and 7 cube cubes with grass on the roof. Both facilities are a comfortable place for families. Trainville, a train accommodation, has eight rooms. Up to 3 people per room. Since you are at the train theme park, it is also a good idea to sleep overnight in Trainville. An auto camping site with 31 sites is also operated for campers.
Natureville
There is also a food station where you can eat. In summer, guests can enjoy swimming in the mini-pool. On the main square of Chuchu Station, a fountain show is held with LED lights.
Cubeville
After staying overnight at Chuchu Park, it is okay to visit a nearby beauty waterfall the next day. The road from Chuchu Park to Miin Falls was not maintained. You can take a car to Tongli and go from Tongli to the beautiful waterfall.
Trainville
At the beginning of a mountain road to Miin Falls, you pull a car and fold into the mountain road. If you go down a steep mountain path, you have to go through a small temple to reach the beauty waterfall. A passing box was placed at the passage of the temple, and the phrase “Insert 1,000 won” was written to manage facilities. No one keeps it, but thinks it as a cost to manage the surroundings, and puts 1,000 won into a beautiful waterfall. It's hard to go up and down the steep downhill to the beauty waterfall, but it's worth the effort by seeing the beauty of the beauty waterfall and the symposium.
Auto camping site

item.title: Samcheok Gomchiguk, a winter delicacy that makes the nation's favorite - Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea

Samcheok Gomchi soup with old paper and boiled

Samcheok Gomchiguk, a winter delicacy that makes the nation's favorite

Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do, Korea

Sea fish called Gomchi in the East Sea, water catfish in the South Sea, and water fish in the West! The season of Gomchi caught across the coast of the Korean Peninsula has arrived. Another reason why lovers and gourmets from all over the country are waiting for the winter, heading to Samcheok, his hometown, to taste Gomchi soup, a taste of winter season.

The winter east coast is rich. This is thanks to a variety of foods that will satisfy our taste, unlike the look that looks lonely. For the same reason, gourmets and lovers from all over the country run to the east coast in winter. Start with Yangmi-ri and Guamegi in the northern part of Gangwon, and head down the east coast. Samcheok's gomchi soup with a sweet drink, gourmets' taste, and the long legs snow crab of Uljin and Yeongdeok, and Gwamegi of Pohang, are all lined up with ‘delicious things’.

Among them, if Yangmi-ri and Guamegi, and snow crab and Guamegi are 'Anju Yong', 'Gomchiguk' is 'Haejangyong' to solve all of them in one shot. Of course, it's a great 'flavor' for a single meal without dividing it into anjuyong and haejangyong, but if you visit the scene to taste them, so if you come across the winter sea breeze and face these foods, the idea of 'hanzan' You will hear by itself. Why the winter sea is so bright (remembering alcohol)!

Winter coastal hidden gourmet gomchi soup

I want to go to taste all the food on the east coast because I feel like it. If you have a drink in Yangmi-ri and snow crab and dissolve with Gomchi-guk, then go to Pohang and finish with Gwamegi and Water, what's the better winter coastal taste of East Coast? However, the main character of this tour is Gomchiguk, which is relatively less known than other winter coastal delicacies.

Fish fills the East Coast of winter

Gomchi soup, as its name suggests, is a fish called Gomchi. The name of this guy caught across the coast of Korea is slightly different from coast to coast. It is called Gomchi or Water Bear in the East Sea, Water Mage or Water Catfish in the South Sea, and Jambang or Water Tumbang in the West Sea. It can be interpreted that it is as common and popular that the word for the same fish varies from coast to coast. The most familiar name for us right now is water catfish and water squirrel, among which ‘water squirrel’ is the name that fishermen who caught gomchi threw ‘tumbles’ back into the water after seeing the appearance. The appearance of Gomchi, which can never be observed, can be seen in his nickname.

Fish fills the East Coast of winter

However, in the Encyclopedia of Fish in the Joseon Dynasty <Jangsaebo>, Jeong Yak-jeon wrote Gomchi and said, "The taste is mild and good for the sake bottle." It wasn't that the name of Multumbung was a joke from the bosses who caricatured his ugly appearance. Or maybe it was a trick by lovers who noticed the true value of Gomchi. A name that was called ‘water bear’ or ‘gomchi’ because of its dark appearance is like a bear is also a good hint of his appearance. Some of the divers are bitter because of their ferocious nature, they are far from the appearance and personality that can be loved.

Samcheok Port's Information Board 'Today. Gomchi soup sea urchin
Nevertheless, the only thing that Gomchi is loved is because of the 'flavor'. Unlike the outrageous personality and ugly appearance, the soft flesh that melts at the tip of the tongue and the cool soup taste! The lyrics to the song “I want to see once and see twice and keep looking” are transferred to “I want to eat once and eat twice and keep eating”.
Scenery of Samcheok Port, known as the hometown of Gomchi
The texture of this fish coexists with soft flesh and slippery skin texture. The viscous part between the skin and the flesh may be unfamiliar to the newcomers, but if you are a lover, you will get used to it after you taste it twice. Those who like 'Agujjim (Aguijjim is the real name)' come up with a similar texture. At first, the slippery viscous part is awkward because it is “like a runny nose,” but sometimes they argue that they will eat each other. In the case of Samcheok Gomchi soup, which is boiled with old paper, it is easy to pass by mouth. Ah, there are differences in how to cook Gomchi soup and how it comes out.
Scenery of Samcheok Port, known as the hometown of Gomchi
